dvPortgroupType.label: Type of portgroup: earlyBinding, lateBinding, ephemeral

GENERATED_8a0ba76f-33f3-49b1-956a-ef61d4.default: earlyBinding - A free distributed virtual switch port is selected and assigned to a virtual machine when the virtual machine is reconfigured to connect to the port group. ephemeral - A distributed virtual switch port is created and assigned to a virtual machine when the virtual machine is powered on, and is deleted when the virtual machine is powered off. An ephemeral port group has no limit on the number of ports that can be a part of this port group. In cases where the vCenter Server instance is unavailable, the host can create conflict ports in this port group to be used by a virtual machine at power on. lateBinding - Deprecated as of vSphere API 5.0 A free distributed virtual switch port is selected and assigned to a virtual machine when the virtual machine is powered on.
